author: SmackEh
body:
Broke even on my AC stock today and offloaded it. 

I'm long on TDOC, WDC and BRK-B.

PTON is an over valued meme stock and I'm glad it's tanking (sorry if you're bag holding)

SHOP will persist.. NFLX will face head winds.

author: Tvekelectric
body: 100% agree. Western Digital had amazing earnings even for a normal period and their stock dropped 10%. You have to realize in the short term stocks are basically just gamblers. They don't correlate to anything other than person feelings. The only way to play earnings is by going out 1-5 years which I know on this subreddit is blasphemy.

author: KSD123
body: WDC and ADS long dated calls you can thank me later

author: Potato_Octopi
body: I think commodities have some upside as things get back to normal (CF ,ET and WY) and mREITs have upside as their book values rise AGNC. Data storage is also still beat up WDC.

author: modichin
body: Now that you mentioned it,  a lot of options that I've purchased and incurred losses on have been around a moment of haste. It's almost like I was going to miss the train. One such current option I purchased today would be a WDC $40p 5/08 @ 1.58 premium.

author: SmackEh
body: WDC just dropped about 12% after earning, mostly due to cutting dividends.. which is actually smart for the company. The future outlook of the company is very positive imo, in particular their data center segment is rock solid.

author: getothemax
body:
I'm in my late 20s and I'm building my portfolio on paper at the moment. I'm going for a long term dividend investment and some companies I believe in. I'll put a little more in high dividend stocks each month than the others. I have 34 companies right now, which is a lot, I like to be diversified though. Any thoughts?

Boeing 5%

Caterpillar 2%
